name: King Of Pirates：Grand Line
description:
King Of Pirates use a popular anime as the backgound, thousand of character come to live!

Light up your heart! Over thousand partner waiting for you to recuit, build up your own pirate crew!

Different teams tactics can give you different experience!

Multi game mode to challenge your crew’s power.

You are not alone on the adventure, play with friends and go adventure together!

Excited multi-Battle to help you become the King of Pirates!

Become a adventurer, join the King Of Pirates and save the partner!
